creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: brown robe with navy blue applique, light blue embroidery, and brown velvet trim; embroidery accents extend beyond the stepped applique on the sleeves, yoke, center opening, bottom section, and upper back; ties along the waist line and collar are all brown velvet (two at front center, one on PR side) and one interior tie is blue (on PL side)
markings: interior PR, Thomas Murray Collection label: ANU 6190
medium: Cloth: nettle fiber; cotton appliqué and embroidery
title: Retarpe robe with detailed embroidery
